summary:
I am a native English speaker and have been proofreading/editing texts since 2011. I also translate texts from Dutch or French into English. I am a CELTA-qualified teacher of English as a Foreign Language.

PROOFREADING AND EDITING 
 
I am experienced at proofreading and editing a wide variety of non-fiction, business and academic texts. My recent work includes editing website copy for a career coaching business (https://www.udiversecoaching.com/). My academic background is in social sciences and economics and I have edited academic texts on subjects ranging from language to analysing business strategies, e.g. "Interpreter Training in Context" (https://www.springer.com/gp/book/9789811585937).   
 
TRANSLATING (Dutch or French to English)

My main translating specialisms are social sciences, NGOs/non-profits and general business/marketing. Work I have done recently includes translating a sustainable energy company's annual report (https://annualreport.energyvision.be/2022/), and website copy for an agency specialising in internal communication and change (https://www.involve.eu/en/). 

TEACHING

I am a CELTA-qualified teacher working with adults in Amsterdam at all levels, from beginner to advanced. I am particularly experienced in Business English, Academic English (EAP) and working with people looking for employment.
